examples.example: 我通过自己的努力工作，终于攒够了十万块，这让我特别有成就感。

translate.english: I finally saved up one hundred thousand yuan through my own hard work, which made me feel a great sense of accomplishment.

examples.example: 我凭借自己的勤奋和智慧，成功赚到了十万块，真是令人开心。

translate.english: I successfully earned one hundred thousand yuan by relying on my own diligence and wisdom, which is really delightful.

examples.example: 我用十万块给父母买了一份贴心的礼物，看到他们开心的笑容，我也感到无比幸福。

translate.english: I used one hundred thousand yuan to buy a considerate gift for my parents. Seeing their happy smiles, I also felt extremely happy.
